overview: Here it is folks, for the first time in Blu-ray - or should I say 'Blue Ray' - Rock' em Sock' em 24. The best hits, saves, goals, bloopers and more from the 2011-2012 NHL Season in true hi-def! We take a look back at the hardest fought playoffs in memory and the LA King's run to their first Stanley Cup Championship. Of course we have the best of Coach's Corner and I show off my musical talent. Get ready for the best Rock' em Sock' em yet. Ya ready, let's go!
tagline: Highlights from the 2011-12 NHL season. Narrated by Don Cherry.
title: Don Cherry's Rock'em Sock'em Hockey 24
